name: Google Forms
description: Read Google Forms structure and responses
author: OneClaw Team

tools.name: forms_get
tools.description: Get the structure of a Google Form by its ID. Returns the form title, description, and all items with their question types, options, and settings.

tools.name: forms_list_responses
tools.description: List all responses submitted to a Google Form. Returns a summary of each response including response ID, timestamps, and answer count.

max_results.description: Maximum number of responses to return (default: 25)

tools.name: forms_get_response
tools.description: Get a specific response submitted to a Google Form by its response ID. Returns the full response data including all answers.
